rat.description: Resourceful, quick-witted, and adaptable. Rats are known for their intelligence and ability to thrive in various situations. Their lucky numbers represent ambition, cleverness, and flexibility.

ox.description: Dependable, strong, and determined. Oxen symbolize hard work, perseverance, and reliability. Their lucky numbers represent stability, resilience, and steady progress.

tiger.description: Brave, confident, and charismatic. Tigers embody power, courage, and leadership. Their lucky numbers represent strength, ambition, and success.

rabbit.description: Gentle, compassionate, and intuitive. Rabbits are associated with sensitivity, kindness, and harmony. Their lucky numbers represent peace, creativity, and good fortune.

dragon.description: Magnanimous, charismatic, and ambitious. Dragons are symbols of power, excellence, and vitality. Their lucky numbers represent success, innovation, and prosperity.

snake.description: Mysterious, wise, and intuitive. Snakes possess depth, insight, and elegance. Their lucky numbers represent wisdom, transformation, and hidden knowledge.

horse.description: Energetic, passionate, and independent. Horses symbolize freedom and an adventurous spirit. Their lucky numbers represent vitality, power, and the ability to break through obstacles.

goat.description: Gentle, kind-hearted, and artistic. Goats are associated with creativity, empathy, and tranquility. Their lucky numbers represent harmony, balance, and artistic expression.

monkey.description: Clever, playful, and sociable. Monkeys are known for their wit, intelligence, and adaptability. Their lucky numbers represent ingenuity, curiosity, and opportunity.

rooster.description: Confident, honest, and hardworking. Roosters symbolize diligence, loyalty, and integrity. Their lucky numbers represent precision, honesty, and good judgment.

dog.description: Loyal, sincere, and protective. Dogs are faithful companions known for their loyalty, honesty, and courage. Their lucky numbers represent loyalty, sincerity, and steadfastness.

pig.description: Honest, tolerant, and diligent. Pigs are symbols of kindness, generosity, and diligence. Their lucky numbers represent abundance, prosperity, and happiness.
